thread.title: Ideas for a California Vacation in August
thread.title_full: Ideas for a California Vacation in August

title: Ideas for a California Vacation in August
text:
Ideas for a California Vacation in August California Travel Notebook: August 2015 Sign Up for our Free Newsletters Thanks, You're in!   Expert Videos 
If you're planning a trip to California this August - or if you're a California resident who wants to visit another part of the Golden State - I'm opening my travel writer's notebook to show you what's inside. 
Here's a roundup of all kinds of things to do, things we like and fun events happening in California this August Sunset at Pigeon Point Lighthouse. ©2008 Betsy Malloy Photography. Used by Permission. • August's Not-So-Big Holiday: National Lighthouse Day 
August is one of the few months that has no big holidays, so let's celebrate a small one instead. August 7 is National Lighthouse Day, created to honor the day the Federal government took over operation of coastal lighthouses in the United States - back in 1789. 
August is a nice month to visit the California coast, where you'll find quite a few scenic light stations to visit. Find out which ones are close to you on this map . 
If you don't have time to go see a lighthouse in person, we've got you covered with these 16 Gorgeous California Lighthouse Photos . More » San Diego County Fair. No Nombre Photography/Flickr/CC BY-NC-ND 2.0 • The Best Things We Can Think of to Do in August 
School starts in September and the first day of fall will be here before you know it. Make the best use of those summer nights before they're gone: Summer Nights in Los Angeles : As you might expect, there are lots of fun ways to see a movie outside a night in LA, including in a cemetery or on a downtown rooftop Summer Nights in San Diego : You'll find lots of great concerts, an old-fashioned drive in movie theater and a "dive in" movie, too Summer Nights in San Francisco : How about a night time food fest or a theatre festival? Summer Outdoor Theatre in California : It's not all boring Shakespeare fests - and the surroundings can be so nice that you get distracted from the play Summer Outdoor Concerts in California : I love a balmy summer night at the Hollywood Bowl, but it doesn't end there. Take a look at these outdoor music fests that are worth a trip just to go Horse Racing at Del Mar. Lin Mei/Flickr/CC BY 2.0 • California in August 
These guides include things we've done and we think you'd like them, too - and a collection of things that look like fun to try. Disneyland in August: August at Disneyland is hot-hot-hot. Hot as in high temperatures. Hot as in popular and hot like a pretty girl. You'll need our strategies to tackle it without melting like a chocolate bar left out in the sun Los Angeles in August : In Los Angeles, August is a good time to head for the beach - or spend a fun evening at the hard-to-describe but fascinating Pageant of the Masters San Diego in August : Go to the races, try an overnight campout at local attractions or just go to the beach San Francisco in August : Street fairs, big outdoor music fests and baseball are just the thing to in San Francisco for summer's last big month
